item.title: More Die Young Drawings
item.description:
More Die Young Drawings

Here's a drawing I just finished making! I thought I'd practice my animation skills a few weeks ago by attempting to replicate a few frames of Vivienne Medrano's Die Young Animation.

item.title: The Living Tombstone - Squid Melody [Blue Version] (Splatoon Original Track)
item.description:
The Living Tombstone - Squid Melody [Blue Version] (Splatoon Original Track)

This is a really awesome song. I've listened to it on repeat for hours. (The Red version is pretty rad too.)

item.title: Zoophobia - Adapting Zoophobia into an Animation (Timelapse)
item.description:
Zoophobia - Adapting Zoophobia into an Animation (Timelapse)

Today, I rotoscope (or whatever you want to call it) Vivziepop's epic Zoophobia comic. (The next episode of Game Glitch is set to be published on Christmas day. Look forward to it!) I'm just excited to help bring all these great characters to life!

item.title: Spore - Game Glitch
item.description:
Spore - Game Glitch

Today, I take a look at some glitches in Spore. http://www.AveryMiller.org Copyright Avery Miller Subtitles are available! Disclaimer: Fair use lets me put copyrighted material in my content without explicit permission from the copyright owner. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use.
